original: @223a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @223a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sv'a dha nam /
analyzed: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sv'a dha nam /
translated: Prajñāpāramitā Sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Perfection of Wisdom

original: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas yi ge aa las byung ba'i zla ba la yi ge hr'i: ser pos bskyed pa'i sna tshogs padma la yi ge ha: ser po yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs yig bcu drug gis yongs su bskor ba /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas yi ge aa las byung ba'i zla ba la yi ge hr'i: ser pos bskyed pa'i sna tshogs padma la yi ge ha: ser po yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs yig bcu drug gis yongs su bskor ba /
translated: By the previously explained ritual process, on a moon arisen from the letter A, one should generate a variegated lotus with the yellow letter HRĪḤ, and on that a yellow letter HA, surrounded by the sixteen vowels beginning with A.

original: phyi rol du ka la sogs pa brjod pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du ka la sogs pa brjod pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor bar bya ba'o //
translated: Outside of that, one should surround it with the thirty-two letters beginning with Ka.

original: de nas 'gying bag ma dang / phreng ba ma dang / gar ma dang / glu dbyangs ma dang / me tog ma dang / bdug pa ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma brgyad do //
analyzed: de nas 'gying bag ma dang / phreng ba ma dang / gar ma dang / glu dbyangs ma dang / me tog ma dang / bdug pa ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma brgyad do //
translated: Then there are the eight yoginīs called Ardhasī, Mālā, Nṛtya, Gītā, Puṣpā, Dhūpā, Dīpā, and Gandhā.

original: de dag rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ye shes kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ye shes kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: All of those completely transform into a moon mandala of wisdom, blazing with light rays.

original: de'i steng du ni padma'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ni padma'o //
translated: Above that is a lotus.

original: de'i steng du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti'o //
translated: Above that is a book of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i steng du ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
translated: Above that is a second moon mandala.

original: de'i steng du ni po ti gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ni po ti gnyis pa'o //
translated: Above that is a second book.

original: de dag rnams thams cad kyang yongs su gyur pa las ni bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag rnams thams cad kyang yongs su gyur pa las ni bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma yin te /
translated: All of those completely transform into Bhagavatī Prajñāpāramitā.

original: sku mdog ser mo /
analyzed: sku mdog ser mo /
translated: She is yellow.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa /🔽chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa / chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
translated: She has one face and two arms.

original: 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs pa'i padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs pa'i padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits on a multicolored lotus and moon seat.🔽She has the mudra of teaching the dharma.

original: rgyan thams cad dang na bza' dang ldan ma /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad dang na bza' dang ldan ma /
translated: She has all the ornaments and garments.

original: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i glo gnyis na autpala bzhugs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i glo gnyis na autpala bzhugs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
translated: In the right and left armpits are the books of the Perfection of Wisdom, held by the utpalas.

original: sngags ni / aom a'a: hr'i: h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni / aom a'a: hr'i: h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: The mantra is: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ hūṃ svāhā.

original: yi ge h'um ser po dpral bar ro //
analyzed: yi ge h'um ser po dpral bar ro //
translated: The yellow syllable hūṃ is on the forehead.

original: yi ge a'a: dkar po mgul par ro //
analyzed: yi ge a'a: dkar po mgul par ro //
translated: The white syllable āḥ is on the throat.

original: yi ge dh'i: ser po snying gar ro //
analyzed: yi ge dh'i: ser po snying gar ro //
translated: The yellow syllable dhīḥ is on the heart.

original: yi ge h'um nag po lte bar yin te /
analyzed: yi ge h'um nag po lte bar yin te /
translated: The black syllable hūṃ is on the navel.

original: bzlas pa'i dus su yi ge bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i dus su yi ge bzhi pa'o //
translated: At the time of recitation, it is the four syllables.

original: rjes su bsam par bya ba'o bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rjes su bsam par bya ba'o bya ba yin no //
translated: It is to be contemplated in the aftermath.

original: gser gyi mdog gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @223b ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: gser gyi mdog gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @223b ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of the golden-colored Perfection of Wisdom is complete.

original: // / pandi ta chen po aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta chen po aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: By the monk, Śīlapāla, from the instructions of the great paṇḍita Abhayākaragupta.
